This REI Co-op Lightweight Compression stuff sack provides a convenient way to compress your sleeping bag so it takes up less space in your pack.
Carry boatloads of gear for your weekend, weeklong or extended backpacking trips in the capable Osprey Xenith 75 men's pack. It provides a supportive fit for comfortable hiking and adventuring.
For long backcountry trips or weekends when no creature comfort can be spared, the Gregory Deva 80 pack hauls it all. Its ventilated suspension handles heavy loads with ease, no matter the terrain.

A women-specific hauler that sheds weight without shirking comfort, the Osprey Eja 58 pack features a suspension system that effectively distributes the load weight when you're logging big miles.
From the Canyonlands to the Rocky Mountains, the women's Osprey Kyte 36 pack does it all. It's versatile, lightweight, clean and highly functional.
Use the premium Rumpl Puffy blanket anywhere you go or when you're holed up at home. It offers cozy comfort and the durability to withstand harsh environments.
Designed for backcountry campers who like a regular-fitting bag, the REI Co-op Ambient sleeping bag has an exclusive synthetic insulation that's warm and highly compressible—even when it's damp.

Stay warm with less weight. The women-specific Marmot Trestles 30 Elite 3-season sleeping bag weighs nearly a pound less than a standard Trestles bag and has added insulation where you need it.

product_name: Mini M.U.L.E. Hydration Pack - Kids' - 1.5 Liters
description: The CamelBak Mini M.U.L.E. hydration pack features a 1.5-liter reservoir, a tool organizer pocket and zippered compartments for layers and essentials in a package that fits young explorers.
Turn your 8-to-12-year-old loose on the trail with the durable Tarn 18 daypack from REI. Aspiring young hikers will love the kid-specific comfort, thoughtful design and variety of pockets.
Ideal for day-to-day use and short hikes away from basecamp, the Flash 18 pack converts into a stuff sack when you turn it inside out. The back panel slips out for use as a sit pad.

description: The CamelBak Crux StoAway hydration reservoir with Thermal Control insulation turns any pack into an all-season hydration system.

The lightweight Big Agnes Pumphouse Ultra is a multi-use sleeping pad inflation pump that doubles as a backcountry shower, camp pillow, compression stuff sack and dry bag.

Available in 4 sizes, the REI Co-op Lightweight Roll Top dry sack is designed to keep essentials dry inside your backpack.
The Cocoon Merino Wool Mummy Liner is made with very fine, non-scratchy wool for excellent comfort when you're traveling and camping out. You can slip it inside your sleeping bag or use it alone.
